divs: sighting detailsmy girlfriend and i, were taking pictures of the downtown lights at night. when my girlfriend saw a strange light which at first she thought was a police car... but the lights were not flashing. then the light floated above any bridge in downtown, then she knew it was not a car! she then got my attention, and instantly i grabbed my camera! i took a picture on accident before i switched my camera to video. i think i got some good footage of it floating way above bridges and even going way below them almost on top of the river, which proves its not a helicopter! it then seems to fade away into nothing after it twinkles red and blue for a quick second! i also still have the raw video on my camera to prove it is unaltered raw film!!! check it out! i posted it on my youtube channel which shows my girlfriend and i talking about it and the footage of the ufo! go to [links moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg]
